code: given("I have {int} cucumbers in my basket", function(n_cucumbers, context) {   context$n_cucumbers <- n_cucumbers })  given("I have {int} cucumbers in my basket and a table", function(n_cucumbers, table, context) {   context$n_cucumbers <- n_cucumbers   context$table <- table })  when("I eat {int} cucumbers", function(n_cucumbers, context) {   context$n_cucumbers <- context$n_cucumbers - n_cucumbers })  then("I should have {int} cucumbers in my basket", function(n_cucumbers, context) {   expect_equal(context$n_cucumbers, n_cucumbers) })
